title: About Cosmic Reaver Kassadin
body:
It seems to have mostly gone unnoticed, but the Cosmic Reaver Kassadin skin's voice processing has been(in my opinion) vastly improved in this patch for whatever reason. I'm assuming it's because of the Cosmic skin line being extended with {{champion:497}} {{champion:498}} and {{champion:11}} . I want to thank you guys for that. I like it!

Sincerely,
-A Kassadin main since season 1

replies.body: Hey! Yes! This was something we updated with this patch because, as you've said, the thematic of the patch was Cosmic! It's great to hear that you're excited about the changes! <3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=L2rob3au,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-21T16:32:16.572+0000)
>
> Hey! Yes! This was something we updated with this patch because, as you've said, the thematic of the patch was Cosmic! It's great to hear that you're excited about the changes! <3

What about the skins visuals?
The visuals aren't something we're changing up at this time, since we don't feel like he's super out of date.
That's cool. Hope that's something you'll do for older skin lines when new ones show up.
I'm still a little sad there was no Cosmic Reaver {{champion:56}} {{item:3070}}

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=L2rob3au,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-21T16:32:16.572+0000)
>
> Hey! Yes! This was something we updated with this patch because, as you've said, the thematic of the patch was Cosmic! It's great to hear that you're excited about the changes! <3

How much mon...cookies I pay you to make cosmic Yasuo :P
I'm a Kass main myself. Have wanted to get this in game for a long time. Happy you like it :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot N0TAR,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=L2rob3au,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-04-21T19:32:06.949+0000)
>
> I'm a Kass main myself. Have wanted to get this in game for a long time. Happy you like it :)

Yo, thanks for the surprise. Just wondering though, when will the true VU of Kassadin will come? Especially for the Cosmic skin! Compared to Cosmic Blade Yi it feels underwhelming. Also, will be Kassadin getting new voicelines, like Lux and Maokai?
Any RIOTER Main {{champion:126}} ? I'm asking for a Friend.
I used to like the skin but with the new voice I think its garbage :/
Woah. Is this voice filter edits of the original voice clips? Sounds like a complete overhaul

Just played him right now, and was positivel surprised. The new Voice sounds a lot better!
It's at least some improvement until there will be a VO update.
